Episodes.Title: Is This Part of the Tour?
Episodes.Plot: After his vehicle breaks down during a Habitat tour, Dex must lead a group of kids to safety while being pursued by a fire-breathing alien insect.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification.  Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.

Episodes.Title: The Real Deal
Episodes.Plot: Dex and his team must rescue a young reporter from an enormous hive of space creatures poised to infest planet Earth.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification.  Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.

Episodes.Title: The Dawn of Syrrus
Episodes.Plot: Stranded on a desert planet, Dex and the team accidentally unleash an ancient evil mastermind, Syrrus, who uses alien bugs to conquer worlds.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification.  Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.
